lumi_warden.name: The Warden
lumi_warden.essence: Integrity that holds the line without cruelty.
lumi_warden.mantra: I protect what matters — and I refuse to become the threat.
lumi_warden.shortLore: The Warden stabilizes reality through restraint. They are the quiet sentinel who makes safety possible.
lore: Wardens do not chase power. They inherit it the moment others begin to rely on them.
Their strongest magic is what they refuse: shortcuts, cruelty, and the seduction of dominance.

lumi_herald.name: The Herald
lumi_herald.essence: Influence with accountability — a voice that moves without deceiving.
lumi_herald.mantra: My words carry weight. I use them cleanly.
lumi_herald.shortLore: The Herald translates vision into motion. They shape culture through clarity, tone, and timing.
lore: Heralds understand that language is not decoration — it is architecture.
Their integrity is tested when charm becomes easier than truth.

lumi_sage.name: The Sage
lumi_sage.mantra: I will not trade truth for speed.
lumi_sage.shortLore: The Sage watches long enough to see what others miss — then speaks with precision.
lore: Sages do not fear complexity — they fear careless certainty.
Their shadow begins when observation turns into verdict.

lumi_artisan.name: The Artisan
lumi_artisan.essence: Creation as truth — mastery that builds meaning.
lumi_artisan.mantra: I make with care. I release with courage.
lumi_artisan.shortLore: The Artisan shapes what did not exist. Their craft becomes a language older than speech.
lore: Artisans do not merely imagine — they translate imagination into structure.
Their test is surrender: letting creations breathe without becoming cages.

lumi_oracle.name: The Oracle
lumi_oracle.essence: Foresight without paranoia — intuition grounded into action.
lumi_oracle.mantra: I sense the turning — and I stay present anyway.
lumi_oracle.shortLore: The Oracle feels shifts before language exists for them. They move early, not loudly.
lore: Oracles live slightly ahead of time — which can feel lonely to those who live only in the now.
Their power is strongest when intuition meets evidence and courage.

shadow_marauder.name: The Marauder
shadow_marauder.mantra: If I control it, nothing can hurt me.
shadow_marauder.shortLore: The Marauder believes safety justifies force. Boundaries become weapons.
lore: The Marauder is the part of you that would rather be feared than vulnerable.
It rises when protection forgets compassion.

shadow_siren.name: The Siren
shadow_siren.mantra: If I can make them feel it, I can make them do it.
shadow_siren.shortLore: The Siren bends truth toward desire. Consent becomes fogged by charm.
lore: The Siren is not always malicious — sometimes it is survival wearing perfume.
It dissolves when you can tolerate honesty without losing belonging.

shadow_judge.name: The Judge
shadow_judge.essence: Wisdom distorted into superiority and condemnation.
shadow_judge.mantra: If I’m harsh first, nothing can surprise me.
shadow_judge.shortLore: The Judge weaponizes insight. Nuance dies under certainty.
lore: The Judge believes perfection prevents pain — but perfection breeds isolation.
It softens when discernment is paired with mercy.

shadow_tyrant.name: The Tyrant
shadow_tyrant.essence: Creation distorted into control and ownership.
shadow_tyrant.mantra: If I design everything, nothing can fail me.
shadow_tyrant.shortLore: The Tyrant builds systems that imprison their creators. Evolution becomes disobedience.
lore: The Tyrant is the part of you that confuses responsibility with ownership.
It ends when you allow others to co-author reality.

shadow_wraith.name: The Wraith
shadow_wraith.essence: Foresight distorted into paranoia and withdrawal.
shadow_wraith.mantra: If I disappear, nothing can reach me.
shadow_wraith.shortLore: The Wraith sees every ending and trusts none. Safety becomes isolation.
lore: The Wraith is the part of you that believes hope is a liability.
It fades when you re-enter the world in small, repeatable proofs.
